name: @posthog/hogql-parser
description: WebAssembly HogQL Parser - Parse HogQL queries in JavaScript/TypeScript

scripts.build:compile: emmake cmake --build build_wasm --config Release && cmake --install build_wasm
scripts.build:make: if [ -n "$CF_PAGES" ]; then echo 'Skipping hogql-parser build on Cloudflare Pages'; else emcmake cmake -S . -B build_wasm -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && npm run build:compile; fi
scripts.build: if [ -n "$CF_PAGES" ]; then echo 'Skipping hogql-parser build on Cloudflare Pages'; else emcmake cmake -S . -B build_wasm -G Ninja -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && npm run build:compile; fi

author: PostHog Inc.
